text: "Babe" is a 1979 song by American rock band Styx. It is the leading single from their ninth studio album Cornerstone. It was at the top of the singles chart in the United States, Canada and South Africa, number 3 in Australia and New Zealand, number 4 in Ireland and number 6 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Dutch boy band Caught in the Act in 1997. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Styx songs
title: Babe (Styx song)
